thread.title: IndiGo to transport life-saving drugs to Manipur
thread.title_full: IndiGo to transport life-saving drugs to Manipur

author: IANS
title: IndiGo to transport life-saving drugs to Manipur
text:
IndiGo to transport life-saving drugs to Manipur IndiGo to transport life-saving drugs to Manipur Budget passenger carrier IndiGo on Tuesday said that it will deliver medical aid, including insulin, vaccines, serum and hormones, on a priority basis to Manipur. By: IANS | New Delhi | Published: February 22, 2017 1:49 AM Budget passenger carrier IndiGo on Tuesday said that it will deliver medical aid, including insulin, vaccines, serum and hormones, on a priority basis to Manipur. (PTI) 
Budget passenger carrier IndiGo on Tuesday said that it will deliver medical aid, including insulin, vaccines, serum and hormones, on a priority basis to Manipur. According to the low-cost carrier, the initiative will help those affected by an 80-day-old highway blockade imposed by the Union Naga Council (UNC) on NH-2 (Imphal-Dimapur) and NH-37 (Imphal-Jiribam) that serve as lifelines for the landlocked state of Manipur. 
You May Also Like To Watch This: 
Under the initiative, IndiGo will deliver the medicines “free of cost” for a month. The airline will also help the state government in logistical support and facilitation of drugs and other supplies. Last month, aviation regulator Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) asked all airlines to transport life saving drugs on a priority basis to Manipur.
